_sText:
This are space ships all made by me, and have damage system (2000HP)... Controls:

W: Forward.
A: Left.
S: Back.
D: Right.
ATTACK1: Go up.
ATTACK2: Lasers weapons (6 lasers weapons).

Each hit the spaceship put in red and in a 0.15 seconds put normal color....

Have explosion effect of my nuclear bomb.

/////////EDIT/////


[FIXED] The parent now works fine, thanks to KREVE .
[ADDED] Sound of shot and the engine.
